document_data.caption: A map showing Staghunter's Way and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Staghunter's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Staghunter's Way''' was a small corner road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Staghunter's Way was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It cut the corner between the [[Street of Glances]] and [[Gorl Street]], passing through [[Sighing Maiden's Walk]] along the way. [[Wrightstone Street]] connected with the east side of Staghunter's Way.
